tool_description: Extraction of details from image of an Udyog Aadhaar Certificate in real-time.
name: Udyog Aadhaar OCR
title: Udyog Aadhaar OCR

api_list.name: Udyog Aadhaar OCR
api_list.description: Extraction of details from image of an Udyog Aadhaar Certificate in real-time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://udyog-aadhaar-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_udyog_aadhaar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "udyog-aadhaar-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
